name: Mouse in da' House
description:
Mouse in da House is a game where you help one little mouse to get his cheese. But he need to be careful with the dangers of the house. Cats will be waiting for him.

Hope you enjoy the game!

----------- Controls -----------

WASD or ← ↑ → to move

SPACE to jump (Vertical Jump)

Jump + Running (Horizontal Jump)

----------- Developed using -----------

- Photoshop

- Audacity

- Sibelius

- Unity

Also thanks to:

- Some sounds were taken from https://www.freesound.org/

----------- Ethereal Psyche Games -----------
